title: Video Round Up: Highlights, POVs & More from EWS Val Di Fassa 2022
description: As the 2022 EWS season continues in Val Di Fassa we have rounded up all of the best videos to keep you updated with the racing this weekend.

title: Video: Louis Reboul in 'Release the Dust'
description: Sick riding from Louis Reboul in Virgin, Utah.

title: Introducing the Young Guns of the Nukeproof-SRAM Factory Racing - Dan Booker, Corey Watson & Louise Ferguson
description: Sam Hill, Elliott Heap and Kelan Grant have some new teammates.

title: Bike Check: Seth Sherlock's Intense Tracer 279
description: How many rolls of electrical tape does your bike carry?

title: Pinkbike Primer: Another Big Weekend of Racing at EWS Val Di Fassa 2022
description: Before racing kicks off later this week, here is everything you need to know.

title: Video: Emil Johansson's Record Breaking Slopestyle Run
description: The best slopestyle run of all time?

title: Trickstuff Announces New 4-Piston Brake Caliper
description: The C42 caliper gains a new bleeding port and is now compatible with SRAM brake pads.

title: Throwback Thursday: That Time Anthony Napolitan Almost Impaled Himself Trying to Front Flip Over a Fence
description: This could have been so much worse.

title: Mondelēz International Acquires Clif Bar for $2.9 billion
description: Clif Bar & Company is set to be acquired by the owner of Oreo, Cadbury and more.

title: Video: The Jank Files is Back with Long Stages, Loam Laps & Jesse Melamed Claiming the Top Spot
description: Andréane Lanthier Nadeau, Rémi Gauvin, and Jesse Melamed take on some of the roughest and rowdiest stages on the circuit.

title: Video: Neko Mulally Continues the World Cup Season in Frameworks Ep. 7
description: Neko battles the mud in Leogang and the dusty ruts of Andorra.

title: Video: Pure & Simple Hardtail Shredding
description: No fun allowed.

title: Video: Mitch Ropelato & Ella Connolly Compete at EWS Petzen-Jamnica
description: EWS Petzen-Jamnica was a brutal one with 1000m of rugged, technical descending over a 40km course.

title: Must Watch: Brandon Semenuk in 'Better Late'
description: Always, “Better Late”, as never isn’t an option.

title: Opinion: Why You Shouldn't Care What the Pros Ride
description: If it's winning races, it must be really good, right?

title: The Freedom Machine's Homer: A Steel, Single-Pivot Gearbox Driven Enduro Bike with 27.5" Wheels
description: Spoiler alert - this bike's creator has a BMX background.

title: Revel Bikes Announces Tweedy Dirt Jumper
description: A portion of every Reynolds 853 steel frame sold goes to Brady Tweedy, to support his riding career.

title: Round Up: 18 Bike Industry Jobs Available Right Now
description: We round up some of the more awesome-looking job opportunities in the bike industry that we've seen lately.

title: Pivot Cycles Names Bryan Mason as New President
description: Bryan Mason will transition from Global Sales Manager to the new leadership role.

title: Video: Trying To Find Mountain Biking In The Deep South Of Louisiana
description: Boiled peanuts Ma'am? Christina takes Tom on a tour of her home state of Louisiana with the goal of finding some real mountain bike trails.

title: First Ride: The 2023 Santa Cruz Hightower Gets Tweaked, Not Transformed
description: The Hightower 3 gains in-frame storage and a little port to help make shock setup easier.

title: Video: Official Highlights from the Lemoine Invitational
description: A park contest for MTB with some heavy hitters.

title: Tsuga Announces the Eldorado Hip Pack Collection
description: Tsuga's modular hip pack system has three interchangeable pouch sizes, two waistbelt variations, and an adaptable bottle holder and storage system.

title: Video: Whistler Opening Weekend 2022 with Mahalo My Dude
description: Mega trains, crashes, hot sauce, stuffed chamois, and more!

title: Freenight Releases Planetary MTB Freecoaster Hub
description: Time to dial in those half cabs.

title: Video: Tech Turns & Big Air at Revolution in 'Gwyrdd'
description: Martin Lebl's video makes us want to hop on the next plane to the UK.

title: Video: The Adrenaline Seeking Freerider, Flow-Seeking Manicurist & Rule Follower in 'The Biodiversity of Traibuilders'
description: Entertaining.

title: Fantasy Enduro: Get Your Team on the Line Ahead of Round 3 - EWS Val di Fassa 2022
description: Get your team on the start line for round three of the Enduro World Series in Val di Fassa, Italy.

title: Video: Slow-Motion Slopestyle Highlights - Crankworx Innsbruck 2022
description: The Crankworx Innsbruck Slopestyle went off this year, enjoy it in all its slow-motion glory.

title: Video: 50to01's Craig Evans, Dan Paley & Josh Lewis in 'Greece Lightning'
description: All about the jib.
